title: Lamest champion?
body:
Disregarding lore and that crap...

Who in your opinion is the lamest champion? Just... boring, not fun. Keep in mind this has nothing to do with how good they are, just how lame they are overall.

I have 2.


1. Ezreal.
Q- Shoot something
W- Shoot something
E- Teleport and shoot something
R- Shoot a big something.

zzzzzzzz......



And 

2. Udyr
"I'm running at you, now die." Now in four different colors!
